subject: Help with compiling perl DBD using Oracle Instant client
body:
Hi: I have installed the oracle instant client and trying to install DBD-Oracle. When I run perl MakeFile, I get the following. 

=====================
Using Oracle in /export/home/netcool/oracle
DEFINE _SQLPLUS_RELEASE = "1002000300" (CHAR)
Oracle version 10.2.0.3 (10.2)
        Unable to locate an oracle.mk, proc.mk or other suitable *.mk
        file in your Oracle installation.  (I looked in
        /export/home/netcool/oracle/rdbms/demo/demo_xe.mk /export/home/netcool/oracle/rdbms/lib/oracle.mk /export/home/netcool/oracle/rdbms/demo/oracle.mk /export/home/netcool/oracle/rdbms/demo/demo_rdbms.mk /export/home/netcool/oracle/precomp/demo/proc/proc.mk /export/home/netcool/oracle/precomp/demo/proc/demo_proc.mk /export/home/netcool/oracle/proc/lib/proc.mk /export/home/netcool/oracle/proc16/lib/proc16.mk under /export/home/netcool/oracle)
        The oracle.mk (or demo_rdbms.mk) file is part of the Oracle
        RDBMS product. The proc.mk (or demo_proc.mk) file is part of
        the Oracle Pro*C product.  You need to build DBD::Oracle on a
        system which has one of these Oracle components installed.
        (Other *.mk files such as the env_*.mk files will not work.)
        Alternatively you can use Oracle Instant Client.
        In the unlikely event that a suitable *.mk file is installed
        somewhere non-standard you can specify where it is using the -m option:
                perl Makefile.PL -m /path/to/your.mk
        See README.clients.txt for more information and some alternatives.
     at Makefile.PL line 1072.
==============================
The instant client does not have the .mk files this output talks about. I am able to run sqlplus that is in the instant client and connect to database.

Could someone help.
Thanks
Ravi
